value.title: How to build a CI/CD pipeline for API Management, Part 2 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Miao Jiang joins Scott Hanselman to demonstrate a sample CI/CD pipeline implemented using Azure DevOps and Azure API Management DevOps resource kit. value.title: How to deploy an Azure Web App using only the CLI tool | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to successfully deploy an Azure Web App by using only the command-line (CLI) tool.
